019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.math.BigInteger;
023import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
024import java.nio.file.Files;
025import java.nio.file.Path;
026import java.nio.file.attribute.PosixFilePermission;
027import java.util.Set;
028import java.util.UUID;
029import java.util.logging.Level;
030import java.util.logging.Logger;
031import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.Convertions;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.Dto;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.FsdUtils;
034
035/**
036 * The configuration information from the configuration file.
037 */
038@SuppressWarnings("PMD.ExcessivePublicCount")
039public class Configuration implements Dto {
040    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
041    protected final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(getClass().getName());
042
043    /** The data dir. */
044    public Path dataDir;
045
046    /** The runtime dir. */
047    public Path runtimeDir;
048
049    /** The template. */
050    public String template;
051
052    /** The update template. */
053    public boolean updateTemplate;
054
055    /** The swtpm socket. */
056    public Path swtpmSocket;
057
058    /** The monitor socket. */
059    public Path monitorSocket;
060
061    /** The firmware rom. */
062    public Path firmwareRom;
063
064    /** The firmware vars. */
065    public Path firmwareVars;
066
067    /** The vm. */
068    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
069    public Vm vm;
070
071    /**
072     * Subsection "vm".
073     */
074    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortClassName", "PMD.TooManyFields",
075        "PMD.DataClass" })
076    public static class Vm implements Dto {
077
078        /** The name. */
079        public String name;
080
081        /** The uuid. */
082        public String uuid;
083
084        /** The use tpm. */
085        public boolean useTpm;
086
087        /** The boot menu. */
088        public boolean bootMenu;
089
090        /** The firmware. */
091        public String firmware = "uefi";
092
093        /** The maximum ram. */
094        public BigInteger maximumRam;
095
096        /** The current ram. */
097        public BigInteger currentRam;
098
099        /** The cpu model. */
100        public String cpuModel = "host";
101
102        /** The maximum cpus. */
103        public int maximumCpus = 1;
104
105        /** The current cpus. */
106        public int currentCpus = 1;
107
108        /** The cpu sockets. */
109        public int cpuSockets;
110
111        /** The dies per socket. */
112        public int diesPerSocket;
113
114        /** The cores per die. */
115        public int coresPerDie;
116
117        /** The threads per core. */
118        public int threadsPerCore;
119
120        /** The accelerator. */
121        public String accelerator = "kvm";
122
123        /** The rtc base. */
124        public String rtcBase = "utc";
125
126        /** The rtc clock. */
127        public String rtcClock = "rt";
128
129        /** The powerdown timeout. */
130        public int powerdownTimeout = 900;
131
132        /** The network. */
133        public Network[] network = { new Network() };
134
135        /** The drives. */
136        public Drive[] drives = new Drive[0];
137
138        /** The display. */
139        public Display display;
140
141        /**
142         * Convert value from JSON parser.
143         *
144         * @param value the new maximum ram
145         */
146        public void setMaximumRam(String value) {
147            maximumRam = Convertions.parseMemory(value);
148        }
149
150        /**
151         * Convert value from JSON parser.
152         *
153         * @param value the new current ram
154         */
155        public void setCurrentRam(String value) {
156            currentRam = Convertions.parseMemory(value);
157        }
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Subsection "network".
162     */
163    public static class Network implements Dto {
164
165        /** The type. */
166        public String type = "tap";
167
168        /** The bridge. */
169        public String bridge;
170
171        /** The device. */
172        public String device = "virtio-net";
173
174        /** The mac. */
175        public String mac;
176
177        /** The net. */
178        public String net;
179    }
180
181    /**
182     * Subsection "drive".
183     */
184    public static class Drive implements Dto {
185
186        /** The type. */
187        public String type;
188
189        /** The bootindex. */
190        public Integer bootindex;
191
192        /** The device. */
193        public String device;
194
195        /** The file. */
196        public String file;
197
198        /** The resource. */
199        public String resource;
200    }
201
202    /**
203     * The Class Display.
204     */
205    public static class Display implements Dto {
206        public Spice spice;
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Subsection "spice".
211     */
212    public static class Spice implements Dto {
213
214        /** The port. */
215        public int port = 5900;
216
217        /** The ticket. */
218        public String ticket;
219
220        /** The streaming video. */
221        public String streamingVideo;
222
223        /** The usb redirects. */
224        public int usbRedirects = 2;
225    }
226
227    /**
228     * Check configuration.
229     *
230     * @return true, if successful
231     */
232    public boolean check() {
233        if (vm == null || vm.name == null) {
234            logger.severe(() -> "Configuration is missing mandatory entries.");
235            return false;
236        }
237        if (!checkRuntimeDir() || !checkDataDir() || !checkUuid()) {
238            return false;
239        }
240
241        // Adjust max cpus if necessary
242        if (vm.currentCpus > vm.maximumCpus) {
243            vm.maximumCpus = vm.currentCpus;
244        }
245
246        checkDrives();
247
248        return true;
249    }
250
251    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition")
252    private void checkDrives() {
253        for (Drive drive : vm.drives) {
254            if (drive.file != null || drive.device != null
255                || "ide-cd".equals(drive.type)) {
256                continue;
257            }
258            if (drive.resource == null) {
259                logger.severe(
260                    () -> "Drive configuration is missing its resource.");
261
262            }
263            if (Files.isRegularFile(Path.of(drive.resource))) {
264                drive.file = drive.resource;
265            } else {
266                drive.device = drive.resource;
267            }
268        }
269    }
270
271    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDeeplyNestedIfStmts")
272    private boolean checkRuntimeDir() {
273        // Runtime directory (sockets etc.)
274        if (runtimeDir == null) {
275            var appDir = FsdUtils.runtimeDir(Runner.APP_NAME.replace("-", ""));
276            if (!Files.exists(appDir) && appDir.toFile().mkdirs()) {
277                try {
278                    // When appDir is derived from XDG_RUNTIME_DIR
279                    // the latter should already have these permissions,
280                    // but let's be on the safe side.
281                    Files.setPosixFilePermissions(appDir,
282                        Set.of(PosixFilePermission.OWNER_READ,
283                            PosixFilePermission.OWNER_WRITE,
284                            PosixFilePermission.OWNER_EXECUTE));
285                } catch (IOException e) {
286                    logger.warning(() -> String.format(
287                        "Cannot set permissions rwx------ on \"%s\".",
288                        runtimeDir));
289                }
290            }
291            runtimeDir = FsdUtils.runtimeDir(Runner.APP_NAME.replace("-", ""))
292                .resolve(vm.name);
293            runtimeDir.toFile().mkdir();
294            swtpmSocket = runtimeDir.resolve("swtpm-sock");
295            monitorSocket = runtimeDir.resolve("monitor.sock");
296        }
297        if (!Files.isDirectory(runtimeDir) || !Files.isWritable(runtimeDir)) {
298            logger.severe(() -> String.format(
299                "Configured runtime directory \"%s\""
300                    + " does not exist or isn't writable.",
301                runtimeDir));
302            return false;
303        }
304        return true;
305    }
306
307    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDeeplyNestedIfStmts")
308    private boolean checkDataDir() {
309        // Data directory
310        if (dataDir == null) {
311            dataDir = FsdUtils.dataHome(Runner.APP_NAME.replace("-", ""))
312                .resolve(vm.name);
313        }
314        if (!Files.exists(dataDir)) {
315            dataDir.toFile().mkdirs();
316        }
317        if (!Files.isDirectory(dataDir) || !Files.isWritable(dataDir)) {
318            logger.severe(() -> String.format(
319                "Configured data directory \"%s\""
320                    + " does not exist or isn't writable.",
321                dataDir));
322            return false;
323        }
324        return true;
325    }
326
327    private boolean checkUuid() {
328        // Explicitly configured uuid takes precedence.
329        if (vm.uuid != null) {
330            return true;
331        }
332
333        // Try to read stored uuid.
334        Path uuidPath = dataDir.resolve("uuid.txt");
335        if (Files.isReadable(uuidPath)) {
336            try {
337                var stored
338                    = Files.lines(uuidPath, StandardCharsets.UTF_8).findFirst();
339                if (stored.isPresent()) {
340                    vm.uuid = stored.get();
341                    return true;
342                }
343            } catch (IOException e) {
344                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
345                    () -> "Stored uuid cannot be read: " + e.getMessage());
346            }
347        }
348
349        // Generate new uuid
350        vm.uuid = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
351        try {
352            Files.writeString(uuidPath, vm.uuid + "\n");
353        } catch (IOException e) {
354            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
355                () -> "Cannot store uuid: " + e.getMessage());
356        }
357
358        return true;
359    }
360}
